goal.ch:
“ 教導 ASAP根本哲理
 教導常用的ASAP指令和功能
 練習使用ASAP
 教導方法和程序用來解決常見的光學系統設計上的問題
 介紹整個ASAP設計和模擬能力之總論“
goal.en:
“ Teach the underlying ASAP philosophy
 Introduce the most common ASAP commands and features
 Practice using ASAP
 Introduce methods and procedures for solving the most common types of optical problems.
 Provide an overview of ASAP capabilities“

outline.ch: “幾何光學, 物理光學, 輻射學/光度學, 雷射/波動光學, 照明/車用照明光學, 色彩光學, 散射光學, 成像光學, 非成像光學.“
outline.en: “Geometrical Optics, Physical Optics, Radiometry/Photometry, Laser/Wave Optics, Illumination/Automotive Illumination Optics, Colorimetry, Scatter Optics, Imaging Optics, and Nonimaging Optics.“
